meta.title: Home - The Joseph Sears School

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

div.p: A 21st-century learning community rooted in tradition and excellence.

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

div.div: Rooted in Tradition & ExcellenceFounded in 1899, The Joseph Sears School community has prided itself on tradition. Discover some of the events and activities that make our school district unique.

Responsible GovernanceThe Kenilworth Board of Education is responsible for setting district policy, monitoring district performance and overseeing district finances. Questions? Contact the school board at listen@kenilworth38.org.
Save These DatesWhether you are looking to move to Kenilworth or your children are returning for another year, stay up to date on important registration deadlines with the registration schedule.
Educational Excellence The Joseph Sears School has been routinely recognized as one of the highest performing academic schools in nation. Learn more about the curriculum that drives student success.
Showing Panther PrideThe Joseph Sears School has a strong athletics tradition that dates back to the early 1900s. Explore the variety of athletic opportunities available to Joseph Sears students.
Supporting each studentOur traditionally small class sizes allow faculty to provide individualized support to all students, including students eligible for specialized services.
It takes a village... Many of the special activities and traditions at The Joseph Sears School would not be possible without the parent volunteers who support the Sears Booster Club and the JSSPVA.

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

section.class: fsElement fsNews fsSlideshow news-list fsItemCount_6 fsSlideshowHorizontal fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailXLarge

div.p: The Joseph Sears School Giving Back Project represents an appreciation for our community and those who are suffering due to the pandemic.
div.a: The Giving Back Project web page

article.a: Read more about The Giving Back Project

div.p: The Joseph Sears School students will access attendance and assignments through the Remote Learning web page

article.a: Read more about Access Remote Learning

div.p: The COVID-19 web page is designed to provide District 38 parents, students, and staff, the latest information regarding the Coronavirus COVID-19 and our school community. COVID-19 web page

article.a: Read more about COVID-19 Information and Updates

div.p: Visit the Master Facilities Planning web page, designed to provide Kenilworth School District 38 stakeholders the latest information regarding the Master Facilities Planning process for The Joseph Sears School. Relevant content will be added on an ongoing basis.

article.a: Read more about Master Facilities Planning

div.p: The community can access all information and presentations regarding the superintendent search process and administrative structure, including updates, here.

article.a: Read more about Administrative Structure Study & Search

div.p: The Joseph Sears School invites parents to chat and build partnerships during our 'Second Cup of Coffee' presentations and discussions to help keep everyone informed about the school and student learning.

article.a: Read more about Second Cup of Coffee

section.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow event-list fsItemCount_8 fsSlideshowHorizontal

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: IMPORTANT: School building and playgrounds closed

div.div: To follow Illinois Governor Pritzker's order, the school building and the school playgrounds are currently closed for the remainder of the school year due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The Remote Learning plans in place for our students will continue for the duration of the school closure order, with specific enhancements that will be shared with you through the Remote Learning web page.
